channel.title: Question about clients etc
channel.description:
Just a question about clients, im wondering how i can make my own client for my server, or just use another with my server ip. Upload it and then send it to my friends so we can play together. I would really like to know because its annoying me at the minute. I have searched all across the web and nothing is happening. Could somebody please please please tell me what to do.
Thanks, Leylo.

item.title: Question about clients etc
item.dc:creator: @_RDS-Pkerz `RDS-Pkerz
item.description:
@_RDS-Pkerz wrote:

um, theres a folder called sprits… go into it it has all the pictures basicly. u can edit them to look the way u want them or u can leave em… and idk lolz change the name and use z-file finder to help u, and like add features like bots or themes ect…i have no idea lolz

Read full topic

item.title: Question about clients etc
item.dc:creator: @leylo leylo
item.description:
@leylo wrote:

I have no idea what to edit inside it though, any ideas?
Could you ask him for me.

Leylo

Read full topic

item.title: Question about clients etc
item.dc:creator: @_RDS-Pkerz `RDS-Pkerz
item.description:
@_RDS-Pkerz wrote:

They way my friend does his is take another client base already made… and change stuff on it, such as sprites. photo’s and features. but dont leech it, idk any other way :o

Read full topic
